OrderReqSigned.summary: The OrderReqSigned sent by a primary.

View.summary: The view in which the primary sent this Message.

SequenceNumber.summary: The sequence number proposed by the primary for this Message.

DigestRequest.summary: The hash digest of the request of this OrderReqSigned.

DigestHistory.summary: The hash digest of the history of the primary when it sent this OrderReqSigned.

param.name: sequenceNumber
param.summary: The sequence number of this Message.

param.name: digestRequest
param.summary: The hash digest of the request of this OrderReqSigned.

param.name: digestHistory
param.summary: The hash digest of the history of this OrderReqSigned.
